name: Resorb Networks, Inc.
tag_list: resorb, nookist, software, development, seo, hosting, servers, ecommerce
overview:
Resorb Networks, Inc, the company behind nOOkist and one of it’s newest products, BlindSpeak, is a Web Development, SaaS (Software as a Service) company aimed at providing highly interactive and visually stimulating experiences on the web.

The primary mission for Resorb Networks is to create radical, never before seen applications for the web. By pushing the boundaries of the web and re-inventing Web 2.0 - we create the ability to amaze and entertain web users throughout the world.

At our company, the pursuit of ideas are a passion with us. Ideas that are rooted in reality. Ideas that are born out of workaday situations. Ideas that lend a fourth dimension to a business situation. Ideas that although sometimes thought to be insane, always seem to work!

Resorb Networks believes that ideas, no matter how weird or how crazy they may seem - should always be given the same amount of thought and research that regular, more feasible ideas receive.

We value smart thinking, like to challenge the status quo, and strive for flawless execution in delivering high-quality products that will make you proud to use our products.

Our team of highly skilled software engineers and internet professionals come from a variety of backgrounds and markets; including financial, pharmaceutical, advertising and bio-technology.

With extensive experience in not only the current technology being used; but also the legacy technologies which are still prevalent in the work place today; as well as porting over legacy applications, code and systems; to developing from the ground up, new systems with the latest technology â€“ you can be rest assured that whatever your project requirement needs are, they can be met with the expertise of our team.
